author: Sam
title: Ciara on â€˜The Color Purpleâ€™: â€œOne of My Proudest Accomplishments of My Careerâ€
text: With [â€˜The Color Purpleâ€™](https://thatgrapejuice.net/entertainment/2023/10/extended-trailer-the-color-purple-starring-fantasia-halle-bailey-ciara-danielle-brooks-taraji-p-henson-more/) off to a [blazing start at the US box office](https://thatgrapejuice.net/entertainment/2023/12/the-color-purple-triumphs-with-huge-christmas-day-opening/), Ciara has joined her castmates in celebrating the film everyone is talking about. As reported, the singer â€“ who [gave birth to her fourth child earlier this month](https://thatgrapejuice.net/2023/12/ciara-gives-birth-welcomes-new-baby-girl-with-russell-wilson/) â€“ plays adult Nettie in the Blitz Bazawule-directed film. Reimagined as a musical, the latest incarnation of Alice Walkerâ€˜s beloved tale also sees CiCi appear on its [star-studded soundtrack.](https://thatgrapejuice.net/2023/12/stream-the-color-purple-soundtrack-featuring-fantasia-usher-megan-thee-stallion-mary-j-blige-h-e-r-alicia-keys-more/) In a touching post, the [â€˜Level Upâ€™](https://thatgrapejuice.net/2018/07/new-song-ciara-level-full/) performer reflects on what the moment means to her and her trajectory at large. See what she had to say belowâ€¦ Sharing a clip of her dancing and posing it up with the likes of castmates Fantasia Barrino, Taraji P. Henson, and Danielle Brooks, as well as the filmâ€™s producer Oprah Winfrey, Ciara wrote: â€œOne of my proudest accomplishments of my career and this year! This was truly an honor to be a part of this beautiful ensemble. Thank you @BlitzAmbassador for believing in me. Me as Nettie! @TheColorPurple Out Now ğŸ’œâ€ One of my proudest accomplishments of my career and this year! This was truly an honor to be a part of this beautiful ensemble. Thank you [@BlitzAmbassador]for believing in me. Me as Nettie! [@TheColorPurple]Out Now ğŸ’œ [pic.twitter.com/xWDazHw2mc] â€” Ciara (@ciara) [December 28, 2023] Touching! â€˜The Color Purple,â€™ which has [nabbed multiple Golden Globes nominations](https://thatgrapejuice.net/entertainment/2023/12/golden-globes-2024-full-nominations-list-fantasia-danielle-brooks-colman-domingo-barbie-more-named/), is playing in US theaters now and dances into UK cinemas on January 26.
